Starter Deck.q: What is the main function of the nervous system?
Starter Deck.a: To receive, process, and transmit information throughout the body

Starter Deck.q: What is the central nervous system (CNS)?
What is the peripheral nervous system (PNS)?
Starter Deck.a: All nerves outside the brain and spinal cord
A nerve cell that transmits electrical signals

Starter Deck.q: What is the function of the cerebrum?
Starter Deck.a: Controls thinking, memory, and voluntary movements

Starter Deck.q: What is the function of the brainstem?
Starter Deck.a: Controls breathing, heartbeat, and basic life functions
